AlgOS

Capturing CO 2 with the power of micro algae

Find out more

Hi, we are AlgOS

We develop an advanced microalgae-based carbon capture technology to make a significant positive impact on our environment and pave the way towards a carbon-negative future.

Additional

All our captured carbon is 100% additional

Permanent

Our carbon is locked away for 1.000+ years

Verifiable

Vision

Microalgae

Microalgae are highly efficient at capturing carbon dioxide and have a much faster growth rate than terrestrial plants.

Technology

We develop a carbon capturing technology that's sustainable, eco-friendly, and minimizes its impact on existing ecosystems. Our technology captures carbon that would otherwise remain in the atmosphere and stores it permanently. We're committed to creating a solution that's not only effective but also responsible, ensuring a better future for our planet.

Storage

The algae biomass in converted though pyrolisis into a stable carbon product like bio char or bio oil. This avoids the natural decay of the biomass and the release of the carbon. It enables a long term sequestration of the carbon under in the ground.
